title: LFM for GOLD5+ Ranked team
body:
Im a support main, looking for more members for a gold 5+ team. 

Requirements

-must have a mic
-must be gold 5+
-must not rage
-must be willing to give and receive criticism 

add me ign Nugget Ninja

replies.body: ADC main feel free to add me or somethin

Mid main, can play top as well. Currently G4 add me IG.

Aspire Nothing
I got gold 5 last season and during the end of s5 and start of s6 I got my rank to gold 2, I'm silver 1 now but I got s2 in my placements and don't play ranked too often, Would I be okay to join?
